headlines.headline: Golden Knights dominate Kings 4-1 with early scoring blitz

headlines.headline: Vasilevskiy stops 33 shots, Lightning beat Panthers 6-1 in final game before break
headlines.description: — Andrei Vasilevskiy stopped 33 shots to improve to 16-0-1 in his past 17 games, helping the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Florida Panthers 6-1 on Thursday night in the final game for both teams before the Olympic break.
